item.name: Auth Managment
item.description: APIs to manage the login and logout

request.description: return all job offers for guests screan.
return all job offers for freelancers screan.
Note: the user will be deleted
return all job offers for this company.

request.description: Sends an invitation from a company to a freelancer.
Accepts a specific invitation by the freelancer.
Rejects a specific invitation by the freelancer.
Retrieves all invitations for the authenticated user (company or freelancer).
Store a newly created job offer proposal.

freelancer update the proposal message
but that does not updates the date of it

display a listing of proposals .
for the freelancer

reject one or more job offer proposals.

company reject one or more proposals

accept a job offer proposal.

company accepts the proposal
filter job offer proposal based on job offer id and sort them by created date.
company or freelancer can see the proposal

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.
